default.0f5c38f0-3c87-4a3e-858e-4f0bed97a4a1: The Step Component is a user interface element designed to enhance the user experience in multi-step forms. It serves as a visual guide, presenting a clear and intuitive way for users to navigate through different stages of a form or process. This component includes indicators for each step, allowing users to easily track their progress and understand the structure of the entire workflow. It also provide actions to easily update the submit form object variable.
